title: Elizabeth de Bruce,
author: Johnstone, C. I.
snippet: " But you are master and commander on the road, and may do your pleasure. 'Tis my duty, however, to warn you, that I don't above half like yon same fires along the mountain's face and round the bay — as if this blessed All- Saints' 1 Eve were Midsummer St. John's !— Look ye ! yonder is another breaking out a-top of the Black Castle ! — Whose corpse light is yon, boys ? 'Tis thought we have O'Toole on board, I know."
